text: Shampoo is a 1975 American comedy movie directed by Hal Ashby and starring Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Tony Bill, Lee Grant, Jack Warden, Jay Robinson, Carrie Fisher, Susanna Moore. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for 4 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1976. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1975 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Hal Ashby Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about elections Category:Movies about hairdressers Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: Shampoo (movie)
